website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy steel construction, generous weight capacity, and a wide mounting bracket make this option ideal for large, heavy TV's.
pros: Heavy-duty construction accommodates up to 200 lbs
Compatible with TV's between 55 to 80 inches
fits a wide range of VESA patterns
Features a top camera tray and an AV shelf
Rigorously tested for safety and stability
cons: Assembly instructions leave a lot to be desired
Cable management holes are inaccessible when adjusted to the lowest height

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Rather than placing a large TV on a clunky piece of furniture, or worse, wall-mounting it on my newly-finished sheetrock, I decided to do a search to see what else might be available, preferably in white. This one is just perfect: easily moved with the castors, height-adjustable (mine is set at the max height) a shelf for a DVD player, and all-white with gray bumpers to prevent scratches. Very pleased with this order.
customer_reviews.author: LovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: This stand is PERFECT! It's extremely sturdy and being able to move ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older 65" professional grade LCD weighing in at 145 pounds. I didn't want to mount it on the wall in the basement since it's not finished and this would really limit us. This stand is PERFECT! It's extremely sturdy and being able to move this monster anywhere and get behind it for cable management is wonderful. The packaging isn't great and it arrived with pieces everywhere but considering how heavy the pieces are I'm not surprised. Love this stand.
customer_reviews.author: L Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, exactly what I was looking for. Easy enough to put together. Wish it had two component shelves and a shelf on the bottom for an external speaker but otherwise a perfect solution to what I wanted. Update, added external speaker to top shelf. Much better sound dispersment than with sound bar on base. No regrets, would definitely buy again.....in fact I did purchase a smaller version for another Tv!
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and it is well made,
customer_reviews.text: The product was packaged well. Considering the weight of the contents this came through the shipping in Great condition. I have gotten other similar products that usually show up missing parts that fell out of the box. The stand is well made and very solid. We are using it as a movie night TV stand for our 75" UHD. The design and the construction are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, nice fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, using on 65" Sony flat panel, very sturdy for that. Fit and finish is nice, everything bolts together well, well made. The only thing I would ding it for would be the cable management. If you have the posts adjusted to be lower than show in ad, the interior post blocks the top cable route in the lower post. We worked around by taking top post cap off and routing cables down from there to lower post opening...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Should have discovered this years ago.
customer_reviews.text: This product could not be better quality. All of it seems to be over engineered rather than just marginal to meet specs. Goes together easily and has the solid feel you want when hanging a $2000 tv on it. Much more versatile than a wall mount and no comparison to stationary table type stands. Provides safety and usability. I was afraid it might appear a bit "industrial in appearance, but the stand almost disappears with a large tv on it. Looks more classy than industrial. Such a safe mount for anyone with kids or pets.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for 70in TV
customer_reviews.text: Way more sturdy than I excepted! Took a bit to assemble but overall not too bad! Super satisfied with this stand, it holds our 70in TV well!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Q

customer_reviews.title: solid and easy to move,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 75" TLC Roku TV, now I needed a stand that could hold it, I did my research and ran into this TV Stand, material quality is ecxelent, easy to asemble, it took me about 35 min. it took 2 people to hang the TV, ones it was secure on the stand it felt solid, the wheels are amazing, they glide trough our floor, solid but easy to move then lock wheels in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho

customer_reviews.title: Great, even on the high end of the TV sizes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our church. We had two 80" TVs that needed a cart. I was skeptical that these stands would support the TVs, but boy was I wrong. These stands are very study and now allow us to easily move the televisions where they are needed. They are very sleek looking. These stands are highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jhpphantom

customer_reviews.title: Needs more legth choices for mounting screws.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these and I love them!! Only giving a 4 because the sets of screws are not long enough for my Samsung TVs. Both are 65". The largest screw is only long enough without spacers for my older TV. The screws are nowhere near long enough for my newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty stand.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, says it will hold 200lbs. I'd believe it. I have three of these North Bayou stands, all have performed well. Nicely thought out build and the uprights are hollow, so wiring can easily be tracked through it making things even cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Durable Mobile TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect TV stand. Extremely durable and heavy which we were looking for. Holds 65” TV on our patio. Great we move all over yard. Don’t have to worry about tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: awesome. easy assembly. good price. durable. holds the weight. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ToneOneOnly

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and quality tv stand for large tv
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well built tv stand. My lg 86 inch works well with it. The assembly is not very difficult. However the manual can be better written.
customer_reviews.author: JasonT2

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: overall it’s a great piece. the actual mounting hardware is a little tricky. the pieces used to lock the tv in required a little creativity to get them to go on securely. otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. C. Dart

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 75" TV for our conference room. Very sturdy. Does not flex under load. Looks good. No issues with assembly though a couple of steps weren't clear, but we were able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: bew5254

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly solid, adjustable TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased a bunch of these for work, we were pleasantly surprised at the quality of construction. I would’ve expected this from a much more expensive stand. The range of adjustability is super handy, and extending the stand in no way decreases its stability. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Stenc

customer_reviews.title: Robust & Sleek Alternative to Wall Mounting
customer_reviews.text: The TV Stand is robust and yet sleek. We really like it. We bought a 70" Vizio LEDTV and this handles it beautifully. We can move it closer to the conference table or even move it from one conference room to another.
customer_reviews.author: Office Manager

customer_reviews.title: So far... So good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use outside... We will see how it holds up, but certainly nice value for inside cart.
customer_reviews.author: Great One

customer_reviews.title: Best Stand ever!
customer_reviews.text: Stand was easy to assemble. Looks great and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Cepeda

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Easy to assemble, better if you have a power screwdriver. Seems very sturdy. Love the shelving placement, they can be raised or lowered.
customer_reviews.author: Wm Lacko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy which is great. Cable management is a bonus. I’m very happy with it. I mounted a 75” tv on it.
customer_reviews.author: LA_woman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large TVs
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand was relatively easy to assemble. It's extremely sturdy and is perfect for large TVs. It rolls easily over carpet and the wheels lock down when you need them to. I'm completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: makafa

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have a 70" Dell monitor attached to the cart and even then, it's very easy to move. The cart itself feels very solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Tak

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our 80-inch TV. Fairly easy to assemble. Very sturdy and easy to maneuver around a room with short carpet. Fits the needs of our conference room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Krystowiak

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to mounting
customer_reviews.text: We got a 75" television for our church and wanted to be able to use it in multiple locations. This stand is very sturdy, and works great for what we wanted to use it for. Great product that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P House

customer_reviews.title: I love it because it's on wheels!
customer_reviews.text: How I can roll an 80 inch TV around on it and place it anywhere in my living room awesome and I recommend anyone to buy one if you don't want your TV on the wall its great.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Well built & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed & sturdy. Instructions were 99% helpful- there's one page in there which is confusing about how to use the screws into the back of the TV, if they cleaned that page up, it would be perfect. Works as advertised and feels like it will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Best stand out there
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. Sturdy, easy to assemble, does not twist or flex when rolling it around. Looks great in the conference room.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most incredible tv stand I have ever seen. It rolls smoothly, it's near impossible to tip and it supports our 65" television with ease. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Tyler

customer_reviews.title: rock solid
customer_reviews.text: Holds up my 80 inch 150 lb LCD without issues. Adjusting the height after installing the TV requires at least two people because it is not easy so once it is set you will live with it. Would be better if there was a motor to control the height.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chao

customer_reviews.title: Very good and sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: A little figuring out from the directions. Once together offers a great way to transport a large TV. I only wish the rubber on the wheels was a little softer for uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and stable holding our 70" LED TV
customer_reviews.text: The product was everything I expected. It is very sturdy and stable holding our 70" LED TV. We have not put it on stage yet; so, I can't report on how it works being moved on and off the stage. I was concerned when the package arrived with one end damaged and wet. However the stand was OK.
customer_reviews.author: CebEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This cart bought for a 55" tv. Very well built, easy to assemble. Looks to be heavy duty and well constructed. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Crandall

customer_reviews.title: professional design
customer_reviews.text: This stand is professional quality, sleek and gorgeous on presentation. We have a 70" Vizio mounted and it's flawless. A perfect design. Rolls very well on many types of flooring (note: not tested on carpet).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's "computer room". He loves it and says it is EXACTLY what he was looking for, perfect for what he needed. He had spent a long time searching for just the right stand, and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: LegoScouter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 70" touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold a 180lb 70" touch screen. Sturdy and a great price. I mounted the shelf on the back of the stand and placed a PC on it. You can't even see the cables or PC, nice clean look. Even has 4 locking wheels. You need to take the TV off to adjust the height but that is fine for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality and Durable to hold my TV which is75 inch
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Rangwala

customer_reviews.title: Nice assemble
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand has been amazing. It gets the tv in and out of the garage for easy access to be used in the backyard for party’s and gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I mounted a 60 inch sharp aquos ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I mounted a 60 inch sharp aquos to this and it's in my home gym. I would and I have recommended this to friends. It moves freely and supports the Wright of the tv without issue.
customer_reviews.author: D-Block

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tv mount. Heavy duty. Will hold a large panel. Good wheels. We roll it outside often. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: A. Pounders Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, fits a large TV
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very Sturdy, fits a large TV, Looks nice, Meets our needs Cons: Height is not easily adjustable (needs 2 people); Ours didn't come with assembly instructions, had to find them on the internet; cable guide is tricky to get a cable through due to it hitting a screw and the pin mechanism to hold it up; I kind of wish there were cable guide holes at different heights so that the cables could come out of the poles near the shelf if it were at different heights; would have liked a nice place to mount a power strip with out drilling holes in it, we mounted ours behind the shelf with zip-ties.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the TV stand. It is solid, pretty, and very handy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: the best that can be said about an assemble-it-yourself product
customer_reviews.text: Went together perfectly . . . the best that can be said about an assemble-it-yourself product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Culler

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, durable materials. Rolls on carpet quite easily. Assembly not difficult. I'm quite happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzyhog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stands! We used them for a conference and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stands! We used them for a conference and mounted 80 inch Tvs. They held up great! We will be ordering 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Morales

customer_reviews.title: Looks sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the product seems sturdy holding 55" TV but its assembly would takes 2 person to do it Thanks to the Amazon delivery folk carry this to my house. Please do not use my name

customer_reviews.title: Broken component.
customer_reviews.text: The shipment arrived with a broken component and considerable effort has been expended by our company to obtain a replacement from the manufacturer without success.

customer_reviews.title: Rehoboth Gear
customer_reviews.text: The strength of it's material is good and the ability to be mobile is good for our church.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased two of these TV Carts and they're amazing. Very high quality and reasonably easy to put together

customer_reviews.title: just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This item is just what I needed for our large 75" screen. Rolls great and seems durable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Handled A 75 inch Vizio no problem.

customer_reviews.title: Both substantial and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are key to providing live-feed video for our hands-on workshops when necessary to provide off-site classes.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. I was worried that it would be easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I was worried that it would be easy to knock over with the weight of a 70" TV but it is extremely stable. Easy to move around and the wheels do lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is shipped with broken part, cannot be assembled
customer_reviews.text: I will never purchase this trash again, so hard to assemble, wasted 2 hours and nothing was done. NEVER NEVER NEVER buy this.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, not difficult to put together and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, not difficult to put together and the construction is very strong. Works great for my 55" tv. Easy to roll & really like allfour wheel locks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and strong with a locking wheel base - holds my 50 inch TV perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy-duty portable stand for large screens. Putting together fairly straightforward

customer_reviews.title: Put a 70' tv on it and it rolls like butter!
customer_reviews.text: amazingly strong and stable stand. Put a 70' tv on it and it rolls like butter!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Way more stand than i needed for my 55" Phillips; i got it because the next one down wasn't quite tall enough. Great build quality, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and rolls around easily with a 75" TV on it. Plenty of height adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Jhotsun

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand was perfect for our old and very heavy plasma TV. Easy to assemble and mount the TV on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In China, not answering emails!
customer_reviews.text: The product seems very sturdy but ours was missing some of the fasteners. They are only in China and have not answered our email.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to adjust height!
customer_reviews.text: The stand was nicely built, the problem was it was too difficult to adjust height. It took three people to make an adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

product_meta.title: NB North Bayou Mobile TV Cart TV Stand with Wheels for 55" - 80" Inch LCD LED OLED Plasma Flat Panel Screens up to 200lbs AVA1800-70-1P (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackAVA1800-70-1P by North Bayou belongs to the steel framed family of mobile TV carts. This model has a completely steel frame for more weight capacity. This heavy duty TV stand has undergone extensive safety testing and has been certified by Underwriters Laboratories (UL), which ensures the highest level of safety and reliability. Its max load capacity - 200 pounds (90.9 kg). All this construction is mounted on 4 wheels which provide smooth and easy maneuvering. Lock them to fix position of the cart and prevent its accidental rolling. TV stand supports all popular televisions with diagonal 55" - 80" and VESA mounting holes from 200x200mm up to 800x500mm. Adjust the height of your TV from 53 to 65 inches. You can use this mobile TV cart anywhere you would like: in your office, gym, bar, outdoor and at home. No need to drill the walls, just roll mobile TV cart anywhere. AVA1800-70-1P comes with two shelves: one adjustable shelf for your devices for streaming, playing and so on, and one top shelf for your web-cam to hold teleconferences. Due to integrated cable management design you can keep television and cable wires hidden inside TV stand’s columns.
feature_bullets: COMPATIBLE with most popular TV brands on the market with diagonal from 55" to 80 inches
UNIVERSAL VESA STANDARDS provide simple matching of your TV and mounting holes of the mobile TV stand; fits VESA patterns from 200x200mm up to 800x500mm
STEEL FRAME of the TV cart allows mounting heavy TV up to 200 pounds (90.9 kg); frame’s material - SPCC steel
ADJUSTABLE TROLLEY CART with height adjustment from 53 to 65 inches
ADJUSTABLE MIDDLE SHELF for cable box, Roku, Tivo, Playstation, Xbox or anything else to create an entertaining center

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
